title: Spoon, "Traveling Spoon", mid–late 18th century
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Oval spoon bowl with engraved floral decoration on back of spoon. Flat tapering handle has floral engraving on both sides. Tapering handle, round in section, with filigree, floral and paisley design around a plain silver shaft. Rose at the end of handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Spoon, "Traveling Spoon", mid–late 18th century.
mid–late 18th century. Silver, brass (under silver overlay). The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-272.
